section.heading: Governing law.
section.text: The law of the District shall govern the:

para.text: Internal affairs of a limited cooperative association; and
Liability of a member as member and a director as director for the debts, obligations, or other liabilities of a limited cooperative association.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 107 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
